attributes.action: give Earldom to Joanna Lumley in order that she may be able to speak in the House of Lords on important issues which concern the people of Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joanna Lumley has proved to be a very passionate campaigner on many issues and it will therefore be in the interest of the nation that she be allowed to do so from the floor of House of Lords.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
